name: Coordinates: Hidden Object Android Game
description:
Coordinates : Best Hidden Object Android Game

We presents 'New hidden object game Secret coordinates'. This is Hidden object puzzle game.
Searching for objects and make fun hidden object game

You will seek and find objects hidden on picturesque locations, play puzzles unique for the genre and make your own character! This manor is a perfect place for you to settle down and play hidden mystery games while you seek and find hidden object game.find hidden objects and solve the mystery. Use your investigative skills and find all the hidden objects.

“Secret coordinates”: Hidden object is an Adventure Puzzle game.Discover HUNDREDS of hidden objects inside this fun game!
This is challenging hidden object game. Follow our crystal clear instructions and helpful tricks to get you through the rough spots! Solve those tricky puzzles. Figure out where you’re supposed to go next. Get tips and hints from our handy Strategy Guide!

Why you’ll love Hidden Objects - seek and find objects adventure game:

- Online & offline modes – enjoy the hidden object game anywhere you go!
- Challenging tasks: try to locate the hidden item and find it!
- Incredible seek and find adventure that's good for both adults and children
- Lots of hidden object levels to explore

So, what are you waiting for?
Download The secret coordinate: hidden object game and enjoy an amazing hidden object adventure!
